resources.string: Enthusiastic senior software engineer with over 9 years of experience leading and contributing to key projects spanning data migration, report creation based on SQL databases, desktop and web application development using C#. Strong background in all software development life cycle (SDLC) phases. Consistently delivers projects on-time and with superior quality. Well-versed in working with colleagues to integrate diverse modules into single, feature-rich applications. Team player, working collaboratively to ensure alignment with desired outcomes.
